Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql

This package contains classes for storing the state of BPEL processes to a SQL database.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeCoordinationColumns SQL table column names.
IAeCoordinationSQLKeys Constants for the Coordination storage SQL keys (keys into the AeSQLConfig object).
IAeJournalSQLKeys Constants for the Journal storage SQL keys (keys into the AeSQLConfig object).
IAeProcessColumns Defines constants for process column names.
IAeProcessSQLKeys Constants for the Process storage SQL keys (keys into the AeSQLConfig object).
IAeQueueColumns Constants that define the Queue column names.
IAeQueueSQLKeys Constants for the Queue storage SQL keys (keys into the SQLConfig object).
IAeSchedulerColumns SQL table column names for scheduler table.
IAeSchedulerSQLKeys Scheduler SQL query keys.
IAeTransmissionTrackerColumns Column names used in SQL table for the transmission id manager.
IAeTransmissionTrackerSQLKeys Constants for the transmission manager storage SQL keys (keys into the AeSQLConfig object).
IAeURNColumns Constants that define the URN column names.
IAeURNSQLKeys Constants for the URN storage SQL keys (keys into the AeSQLConfig object).
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractSQLStorage Base class for SQL storage objects that extract sql statement from AeSQLConfig object.
AeAbstractSQLStorageProvider An abstract storage provider implementation for SQL.
AeConnectionInvocationHandlerFactory Provides factory access to InvocationHandler impls.
AeConnectionProxyFactory Generic factory for wrapping JDBC connections in their proxy instances.
AeDataSource Convenience class to centralize access to JDBC data sources.
AeDbUtils Common db utility methods.
AeDebugConnection  
AeDelegatingDataSource A delegating DataSource
AeJNDIDataSource Implements a JNDI version of an AeDataSource.
AeListingResultSetHandler Provides a template method for reading the results from a filter type listing query.
AeMonitoredDataSource Wraps a DataSource in order to monitor how long it takes to get a connection.
AeQueryRunner Extends the Commons DbUtils QueryRunner to handle Document parameters as character streams and to allow specifying the SQL type of null parameters.
AeQueryRunner.AeSQLNull Implements placeholders for typed null parameter values in prepared statements.
AeResultSetHandlers This class consists exclusively of static methods that return instances of ResultSetHandler.
AeResultSetHandlers.AeDocumentResultSetHandler Implements a ResultSetHandler that returns the first column of the first row of a ResultSet as a Document.
AeSQLAttachmentStorageProvider This is a SQL Attachment Storage provider (an implementation of IAeQueueStorageDelegate).
AeSQLConfig This class encapsulates the SQL statements used by the Active BPEL persistence layer.
AeSQLCoordinationStorageProvider A SQL version of a coordination storage provider.
AeSQLCounterStore Implements persistent counter store in the database.
AeSQLDatabaseType Implements a database type lookup from the database.
AeSQLFilter Base class for building a SQL statement from a filter object.
AeSQLJournalStorage A SQL journal storage.
AeSQLObject Base class for objects that access the database.
AeSQLProcessStateConnectionProvider A SQL implementation of a process state connection provider.
AeSQLProcessStateStorageProvider A SQL version of a process state storage delegate.
AeSQLQueueStorageProvider This is a SQL Queue Storage provider (an implementation of IAeQueueStorageDelegate).
AeSQLStorageConnection A SQL implementation of the delegating DB connection interface.
AeSQLStorageProviderFactory This factory instantiates SQL versions of the queue, and process state storage objects.
AeSQLTransmissionTrackerStorageProvider SQL implementation of the storage provider for the transmission - receive manager.
AeSQLURNStorageProvider A SQL implementation of a URN storage provider.
AeSQLVersion Implements database version lookup in the database.
 

Exception Summary
AeQueryRunner.AeWarning Convenience class to represent a warning stack trace.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql Description

This package contains classes for storing the state of BPEL processes to a SQL database.
